sourcesContent:
import { motion, useAnimation } from "framer-motion"; import { useEffect } from "react"; import { useInView } from "react-intersection-observer"; import "./css_files/roadmap.css"; const Roadmap = () => { const { ref, inView } = useInView({ threshold: 0.7, }); const animation = useAnimation(); useEffect(() => { if (inView) { //end point of animation animation.start({ scale: 1, rotate: 360, transition: { duration: 0.3 } }); } if (!inView) { //start point of animation animation.start({ scale: 0, rotate: 0 }); } }, [inView, animation]); const animation2 = useAnimation(); useEffect(() => { if (inView) { //end point of animation2 animation2.start({ opacity: 1, transition: { duration: 0.5, delay: 0.2 }, }); } if (!inView) { //start point of animation2 animation2.start({ opacity: 0 }); } }, [inView, animation2]); return (
Roadmap
{/* Our Company Goals */}
  1. Q4 2021
    Team Recruitment
    Lunch of the SHIBEX Token
    Creation of the first game
  2. Q1 2022
    Listing on MimoSwap
    Crosschain Swap Polygon
    Listing on QuickSwap
    Partnership with well-known NFT collections
    to integrate them on our “play to burn” games
  3. Q2 2022
    Creation of a game ecosystem with the release of a game every month with NFT partnerships
    Listing on centralized exchange
  4. Q3 2022
    Continuation of NFT partnerships
    Burn a part of the supply with the “play to burn”
    Extend listing on centralized exchanges
  5. Q4 2022
    Creation of a new token that will allow holders to receive dividends.
    This new token could be claim by SHIBEX holders.
    It will have 8B of supply.
To be continued…
); }; export default Roadmap;
